dict.acceptation: 巨大的；庞大的；极恶的；凶暴的；

sent.orig: Dearer food has the capacity to do enormous good and enormous harm.
sent.trans: 更贵的食品能带来巨大的好处也能带来巨大的害处。

sent.orig: Habit is thus the enormous fly-wheel of society, most precious conservative agent.
sent.trans: 习惯因此是社会巨大的推动力，最宝贵的守恒的代理人。

sent.orig: Therefore, enormous potentials remain untapped in Sino-US cooperation.
sent.trans: 中美双方在这方面有很大的合作潜力。

sent.orig: Between those huge, sweating tits that hung enormous the way you'd think of god's as big.
sent.trans: 头被埋在这么大的奶子中间，不禁认为上帝的胸部也很壮观。

sent.orig: I have seen such an enormous boulder.
sent.trans: 我从没见过如此巨大的圆石。
